page.title: 14RAILWAYS
page.content: The railway from Sittingbourne goes to London,Sheerness,Faversham,Canterbury, Margate and Dover.Sittingbourne to London takes 1 hour and 6 minutes and costs Â£5.40 for an Awayday and Â£5 single.To Sheerness it takes 18 minutes and costs Â£1.30 for Awayday and Â£1.10 single.To Dover it takes 49 minutes and costs Â£4.10 for Awayday and Â£3.80 single.FREIGHT Fruit comes from the continent to Woods suppliers. Liquid clay comes from France, Salisbury and Cornwall for Bowater's mill.60 to 70 bags of mail come to Sittingbourne daily. SITTINGBOURNE AND KEMSLEY LIGHT RAILWAY used to belong to Bowater's paper mill.It is now privately owned by Mr.F.W.Fuge.The journey lasts for 2 miles.There are three steam engines in use and 1 diesel.RAILRIDERS club has activities, magazine and discount fares.
